name: All The Hamsters
description:
This game is about survival of the hamster, in it, you will have to survive all the adversities faced by a hamster in order to survive being a hamster, your goal will be to survive as long as possible. 

To play the prototype download the zip, unzip it, and play the .exe file! 

controls: 

wasd = movement

r = infinite respawn (this will be removed in the future)

space = jump

mouse = move camera
